ygData.subject: Re: Iron Raptor/ IRIS
ygData.msgSnippet: Oops, forgot about Firearm. ... Firearm laughs as Iris jumps on his back . His boosters start up, sending them heading toward the Iron Fist. I ve lived

Oops, forgot about Firearm.

::Firearm::

Firearm laughs as Iris jumps on his 'back'. His boosters start up, 
sending them heading toward the Iron Fist.

"I've lived through countless battles and missions, but I think a femm 
might just do me in!"

And with that, his top slowly turns around, the cannon aiming behind 
him. It fires and boosts him forward. Firearm was going pretty fast 
now, althought not even at 100mph. Although he wasn't going as fast as 
Prowl went, this route on the ground was much bumpier than Prowl's 
route through the air.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> ____________________________________________________IRIS:
> 
> 
> * Iris only grumbles, just as an old woman might as she looks onto a 
bunch 
> of children roughhousing. Remembering the good old days.
> But Iris was far from old. She was just as young as Iron Raptor, 
because she 
> was a part of her programming, but much more mature. In body and 
mind.
> Iris humphs.*
> 
> " I've seen data process faster then that!"
> 
> * But she crosses her arms as Firearm transforms and drives up to 
her, 
> looking him over before looking at him sternly.
> Though, she didn't mean to wreck his jolly attitude.
> Iris easily jumped on but then looked down at the armor plating of 
his 
> mode.*
> 
> " Just try it, sunny, and only ONE of us will make it back to base 
in one 
> piece. And it will most likely be the one without the cannon...."
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
